name: Viva la BIBI!
description:
Get ready for 2020 elections,
you need to collect at least 56 מחל cards to win the elections.

The year is 2020, elections will take place in Israel,
again, for the third time, help BIBI, our "king" 👑 
to win the election!
Collect 56 מחל cards and prevent other parties ballots to go in the ballot box.

Have fun ; )
